sentences.en: Amidst the current bunch of nonentities, he is a towering figure.
sentences.cn: 在当前这帮无足轻重的人里面，他算是鹤立鸡群。

sentences.en: He remains a towering figure in modern British politics.
sentences.cn: 他在现代英国政坛上一直是位杰出的人物。

sentences.en: He was in a towering rage about his lost watch.
sentences.cn: 他因丟了手表而暴怒不已.

sentences.en: He was in a towering rage.
He wrung Gerald's hand, towering over him, beaming with good - nature.
sentences.cn: 他捏住杰拉尔德的手, 低头对着他, 憨厚地冲他笑.

sentences.en: I saw her in a towering rage only once.
sentences.cn: 我只有一次见过她大发雷霆。

sentences.en: In the distance loomed a towering mountain.
sentences.cn: 在远处一座巍峨的高山隐约可见.

sentences.en: Seen from afar, its towering buildings beckon the visitor in.
sentences.cn: 从远处看，它高耸的大楼召唤着拜访者进去。

sentences.en: The burly brute swaggered forward, towering over me, and shouted.
sentences.cn: 五大三粗的恶汉趾高气扬地走过来，居高临下地对我咆哮着。

sentences.en: The towering pine and cypress trees defy frost and snow.
They are traitors who have committed towering crimes and deserve more than death.
sentences.cn: 他们是罪大恶极,死有余辜的叛徒.

sentences.en: This town is beset with towering mountains.
sentences.cn: 这座城市为高山所环抱.
白雪皑皑的山峰耸入云霄.

sentences.en: We looked up at the rocky peaks towering above us.
sentences.cn: 我们抬头观望高高耸立的遍布岩石的山峰.

phrases.tran_cn: 艾菲尔铁塔（位于巴黎塞纳河南岸）
n. 象牙塔（指脱离现实生活的小天地）
vt. 远远胜过；大大高出
n. 塔桥（在英国伦敦泰晤士河上的两端各有一塔）

trans.tran_cn: 耸立的，高大的，杰出的，强烈的，极度的
远远高于，远远超过( tower的现在分词)，（在能力、品德、名声等方面）胜过，远远超过（其他人）
